div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 106px; margin-left: 715px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 178px; margin-left: 1209px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 592px; height: 1px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 200px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.font: Place New Order(Buyer Places a new Order):

p.b: // TXN 0 - BUYER TO ESCROW: Pay from order creator to escrow account

div.p: // TXN 1 - ESCROW TO ORDERBOOK: Stateful app opt-in to order book
// TXN 2 - BUYER TO BUYER: (Optional) ASA opt-in for the order creator's original wallet account.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 281px; margin-left: 733px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 592px; height: 1px; padding-top: 190px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 170px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.b: // TXN 0 - ESCROW TO ORDERBOOK: application call to order book contract for closeout

div.p: // TXN 1 - ESCROW TO BUYER: pay txn close out call
// TXN 2 - BUYER TO BUYER: send transaction for proof that closeout sender owns the escrow

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 441px; margin-left: 868px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 589px; margin-left: 783px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 592px; height: 1px; padding-top: 350px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 170px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

h1.span: Execute Partial Order (Seller Executes on a Buy Order):

p.b: // TXN 0 - ESCROW TO ORDERBOOK: Transaction must be a call to a stateful contract

div.p: // TXN 1 - ESCROW TO SELLER: Payment transaction from this escrow to seller
// TXN 2 - SELLER TO BUYER: Asset transfer from seller to owner of this escrow (buyer)
// TXN 3 - SELLER TO ESCROW: Pay fee refund transaction

switch.text: Execute Partial Order (Seller Executes on a Buy Order):...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 717px; margin-left: 855px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 592px; height: 1px; padding-top: 510px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 170px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

h1.span: Execute Order with Closeout (Seller Closes out a Buy Order):

p.b: // TXN 0 - ESCROW TO ORDERBOOK: transaction must be a call to a stateful contract

div.p: // TXN 1 - ESCROW TO SELLER: Payment transaction from this escrow to seller, with closeout to owner (buyer)
// TXN 2 - SELLER TO BUYER: Asset transfer from seller to owner of this escrow (buyer)

switch.text: Execute Order with Closeout (Seller Closes out a Buy Order):...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 755px; margin-left: 748px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 170px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.b: // TXN 0 - BUYER TO ESCROW: Payment Transaction to Escrow from Buyer

p.span: // TXN 1 - BUYER TO BUYER: (Optional) ASA opt-in for the order creator's original wallet account.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 361px; margin-left: 1041px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 372px; height: 1px; padding-top: 420px; margin-left: 995px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 300px; overflow: hidden;

div.p:
Algodex broker watches blocks and parses block data for the Orderbook smart contract transactions. This is a map of what blockchain transactions are collected and how.
All ATOMIC operations happen on Algorand's blockchain. There are three indexers:
1. Algorand Indexer (Algorand Foundation Indexer)
2. Algodex-API Broker (Primary Algodex Indexer)
3. GoAPI (Deprecated Account Watcher)

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
